item.title: Why jagex sucks
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

No no, but I see why you would think that. They redid their database to manage character files more efficiently. It should be in the Update archive somewhere, look back in the 2006 updates and see if you can find them, I don’t really feel like looking, busy with something else.

Read full topic

item.title: Why jagex sucks
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:19, topic:129332”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=179946.msg1648548#msg1648548 date=1186122796]

No, it was updated in 2006, why do you think it was updated that long ago…?

well the site looked different, i thought you ment that, after rs2 new cache came, site updated too in looks
[/quote]
You didn’t understand me fully, I suppose.
They updated the database, improving security and they tried to make it more convenient for users, and then they made this system to save the data for the offense. Anything before that(sometime in 2006, probably May or April) would be considered a Legacy Punishment, but you could have had 5 offenses, it would only count as 1.[/quote]
your smarter then me. (please dont flame me)
but im not being sarcastic but i thought you were talking about when the website look changed lol

Read full topic

item.title: Why jagex sucks
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:17, topic:129332”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=179946.msg1648244#msg1648244 date=1186114577]
No, it was updated in 2006, why do you think it was updated that long ago…?
[/quote]
well the site looked different, i thought you ment that, after rs2 new cache came, site updated too in looks[/quote]
You didn’t understand me fully, I suppose.
They updated the database, improving security and they tried to make it more convenient for users, and then they made this system to save the data for the offense. Anything before that(sometime in 2006, probably May or April) would be considered a Legacy Punishment, but you could have had 5 offenses, it would only count as 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Why jagex sucks
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:14, topic:129332”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=179946.msg1647215#msg1647215 date=1186084441]

Legacy Punishment is something that happened before the update of the website, it happened before June 2006 or something like that, and they didn’t have records then. They keep records of them on your accounts now.

i played classic on a different acc, but when the new rs graphics just updated, on that day i started playing, and the site updated on 2004 im pretty sure

you sure about that?
[/quote]
2003-2005, the old website is hard to remember…

its 2007 right? 4 years ago i start or was it 5? :P[/quote]

I can’t remember but it is 2007… I think so, I can remeber when the site was updated, I thought some new company bought runescape and changed the website a bit…

Read full topic
